alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Northern Tangipahoa; St. Helena (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 11:01PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Helena, northeastern Livingston and central Tangipahoa Parishes through 1145 PM CDT... At 1101 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Independence, or 7 miles south of Amite, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Amite, Amite City, Independence, Roseland, Albany, Montpelier, Natalbany, Robert and Tickfaw. This includes Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 31 and 50. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Northern Tangipahoa; St. Helena
